summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 TOYOTA SIENNA. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBERS: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS) AND 16V858000 (STRUCTURE). THE PARTS FOR THE RECALL REPAIRS WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIRS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHEN THE FRONT PASSENGER AND DRIVER SIDE DOOR ARMRESTS WERE TOUCHED, THE AIR BAG WARNING INDICATOR WOULD ILLUMINATE AND THE SEAT BELT CHIME WOULD SOUND. THE CONTACT CALLED THE ADVANTAGE TOYOTA DEALER AND A REPAIR APPOINTMENT WAS SCHEDULED FOR 6/26/2017. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED DUE TO THE REMEDY NOT HAVING ALL THE NECESSARY PARTS AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION FOR ANOTHER REPAIR APPOINTMENT. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUES. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 46,056. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
